A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie just as a film on its own. Stop being fans boys and pretending this movie is good. Everything good about this film is null and void because it has no STORY!!! Flaws in films are easily forgivable when you have great story with highs and lows. This doesn’t have that. Every great moment is undercut with jokes that seem completely out of place in Star Wars. Just sad \, they could of had a great trilogy and it’s ruined.
